request.description: This route allows to quick addition of work hours for multiple week-days. Please do not use it to add individual dates.

This route allows to quick update of work hours for multiple week-days. Please do not use it to update individual dates. 
Please pass business user id as the last param in url to add user hours against.
Adds user hours for given business node. Please note that if the user hours are beyond the node hours duration, they are truncated to the node hours start and end time for the given day.
Adds user hours for given business node. Please note that if the user hours are beyond the node hours duration, they are truncated to the node hours start and end time for the given day.

request.description:
For past appointments, pass query parameter as show=past.
For future appointments, pass query parameter as show=future.
For cancelled appointments, pass query parameter as show=cancelled.
For all appointments, do not pass show query parameter.
